alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 01 at 5:49PM CDT until July 01 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN JASPER AND JONES COUNTIES... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Laurel, Ellisville, Stringer, Sandersville, Heidelberg, Tuckers Crossing, Moss, Mill Creek, Vernon, Ovett, Hebron, Stafford Springs and Soso. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
